sentences.en: ...drum sticks.
sentences.cn: …鼓槌

sentences.en: a bowl of soup that will stick to your ribs.
sentences.cn: 会让你喝得非常撑的一碗汤。

sentences.en: a measuring stick
sentences.cn: 量尺

sentences.en: a pair of drum sticks
sentences.cn: 一对鼓槌

sentences.en: all that flies back and forth, really, is word-sticks and stones, y'know?.
sentences.cn: 那些流言飞语损不了我，知道吗？。

sentences.en: Aunt Lou walks with a stick (= uses a stick to help her walk ) .
sentences.cn: 卢姑妈走路要拄拐棍。

sentences.en: But legal experts are not sure if such a charge can stick.
sentences.cn: 但法律专家们不能肯定这一指控是否成立。

sentences.en: He gave the donkey a whack across the back with his stick.
sentences.cn: 他拿棍子朝驴背上狠狠打了一下。

sentences.en: He walks with a stick but still leads his soldiers into battle.
sentences.cn: 他虽然拄着拐杖，但依然带领士兵们投入战斗。

sentences.en: he would stick at nothing to preserve his privileges.
sentences.cn: 为了维护自己的特权，他什么事都做得出来。

sentences.en: I tend to stick to fresh fruit for pudding.
sentences.cn: 我一直坚持用新鲜水果做甜点。

sentences.en: I'd like to stick around and watch the game.
sentences.cn: 我希望留下来看比赛。

sentences.en: I'm not a fashion victim; I stick to what suits me.
sentences.cn: 我不是一味赶时髦的人，我只穿适合自己的服装。

sentences.en: If a window is broken, you can't stick it back together again.
sentences.cn: 如果窗户碎了，就无法再把它粘回到一起了。

sentences.en: If we all stick together, we ought to be okay.
sentences.cn: 如果我们大家团结在一起，就不会有事。

sentences.en: If you're in a job that keeps you busy, stick with it.
sentences.cn: 如果你所做的工作能让你很忙，那要坚持下去。

sentences.en: Remember, stick to the issues and don't take it personally.
sentences.cn: 记住，就事论事，不要把问题个人化。

sentences.en: She poked and shifted things with the tip of her walking stick.
sentences.cn: 她用手杖尖翻拨挪动东西。

sentences.en: So you should stick to it.
sentences.cn: 所以你要坚持训练哟。

sentences.en: Stick them on using a small amount of glue.
sentences.cn: 用少许胶水把它们贴上。

sentences.en: The boy stuck his finger up his nose.
sentences.cn: 小男孩把手指塞到鼻孔里。

sentences.en: They collected sticks to start the fire.
sentences.cn: 他们捡来树枝生火。

sentences.en: They prefer, in the end, to stick with what they know.
sentences.cn: 他们最终选择了继续做自己熟悉的事。

sentences.en: This stamp won’t stick properly.
sentences.cn: 这张邮票贴不牢。

sentences.en: Using his stick heavily, he moved jerkily towards the car.
sentences.cn: 他费力地拄着拐杖，一瘸一拐地着向汽车走去。

sentences.en: we got stuck into the decorating.
sentences.cn: 我们抓紧进行装饰。

sentences.en: Why did you have to stick your nose in?
sentences.cn: 你为什么非要插手？

sentences.en: With a stick of chalk he wrote her order on a blackboard.
sentences.cn: 他用一截粉笔将她的指示写在黑板上。

words.tran_cn: 汽车价目标签的；汽车标签价的
尖刀；难题；张贴物；坚持不懈的人
坚持细节的人；顽固的人；费解的事物

phrases.tran_cn: n. 大棒政策（凭借本国实力用武力威胁别国的政策）；云梯
软硬兼施的；胡萝卜棍棒并用的
[美国口语]远离城镇，在偏远地区
(非正式)举起手来！（一个人用枪威胁别人时说的话）
很难（或不能）接受；成为持续烦恼的来源
(非正式，主美)粗暴对待；严厉对待
(非正式)（由于行动或说话大胆）冒招致批评（或惹人生气）的危险

phrases.phrase: stick out like a sore thumb

phrases.tran_cn: 在一起；团结一致；互相支持

phrases.phrase: sticks and stones may break my bones but names (或

trans.tran_cn: 枯枝，棍，棒（状物）， 批评，指责
trans.tran_en: a long thin piece of wood from a tree, which is no longer attached to the tree

trans.tran_cn: 刺，戳，粘贴，附着在，容忍，被证明成立，放置，附着于，固定不动
trans.tran_en: to attach something to something else using a substance, or to become attached to a surface
